title: Poster, ca. 1982
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink on bottom: "Oil painting by Jean Romano of the June 12, 1982 disarmament march in New York City. Issued by the Fellowship of Reconciliation, an international organization of individuals who have joined together to explore the use of nonviolence in solving conflicts at all levels, on the occasion of its 75th anniversary in the USA. Fellowship of Reconciliation, Box 271, Nyack, NY 10960"
creditline: Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, ca. 1982.
ca. 1982. Support: Paper. Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs. 1993-53-62.
